name: Kabutomushi
description:
Pick your fighter and wrestle your way through the ranks to become the King of Insects! 1 - 2 Players. Genre: Fighting

~

Focus and release your energy to knock your opponent out of the ring!

Different bugs have different qualities, try them all for a challenge

Best experienced with friends

~

Controls :

Single-player control : mouse and keyboard 

Multi-player control : controllers

*Note :  For now, multiplayer only supports 2 xbox style controllers *

~

Mac and linux are untested - feedback is welcome!

Hoping to add some a new mode, watch this space

-

Game cartridge by Rogue Cache - @roguecache

The music in the menus by

Ibuki Fkuda - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ibuki_Fkuda/

The music in the fights by

Pistol Jazz - https://soundcloud.com/pistoljazz & http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Pistol_Jazz/
